timeline.message:
[miio] adding new devices

Adding several new devices. including:
yeelink.light.color4 #7016
Mi Home PTX Wall Switches (090615.switch.xswitch03) #7000
Xiaomi Ceiling Lamp (yeelink.light.ceiling11) #6787
Additional sensors and information in zhimi.airpurifier.v7 #5760

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

timeline.bodyText: use tabs to make this consistent with everything else.
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: Maybe update the description too? The channel name has more information than the description does...
timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -307,7 +315,7 @@ e.g. `smarthome:send actionCommand 'upd_timer["1498595904821", "on"]'` would ena
 | Channel          | Type    | Description                         |
 |------------------|---------|-------------------------------------|
 | power            | Switch  | Power                               |
-| mode             | String  | Mode                                |
+| humidifierMode   | String  | Mode                                |

timeline.message:
[miio] fix formatting and channel

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@ The following things types are available:
 # Advanced: Unsupported devices
 
 Newer devices may not yet be supported.
-However, many devices share large similarities with existing devices.
+However, many devices share large similarties with existing devices.

replies.bodyText: Yes,  I known.. to avoid the usual git voodoo I made the comment earlier: note, I moved the 2 typo's correction in the readme to the cloud PR to avoid merge conflict.
replies.author: marcelrv

replies.bodyText: Ah, you didn't specify which two you moved though, lol.
replies.author: cpmeister
